this_title: Last Call: When a Serial Killer Stalked Queer New York
trans_title: 最后通话：纽约同志杀手
introduction: As the AIDS crisis intensifies in the early 1990s, homophobia and hate crimes increase, and a serial killer preys on gay men in New York City by infiltrating the queer nightlife to identify his victims.
chinese_title: 最后通话：纽约同志杀手
foreign_title: Last Call: When a Serial Killer Stalked Queer New York
